item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, March 11, 2025 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Happy 20th Birthday, Y Combinator (441 points | 103 comments)
2. Fastplotlib: GPU-accelerated, fast, and interactive plotting library (187 points | 69 comments)
3. Launch HN: Sift Dev (YC W25) – AI-Powered Datadog Alternative (23 points | 11 comments)
4. Show HN: Factorio Learning Environment – Agents Build Factories (505 points | 157 comments)
5. Truth Functional Logic for Hackers (16 points | 4 comments)
6. New tools for building agents (109 points | 31 comments)
7. NASA to launch space observatory that will map 450M galaxies (72 points | 30 comments)
8. Backyard Cyanide (56 points | 18 comments)
9. Show HN: Krep a High-Performance String Search Utility Written in C (81 points | 32 comments)
10. The US island that speaks Elizabethan English (120 points | 43 comments)
11. A 10x Faster TypeScript (1028 points | 494 comments)
12. Mapping the University of Chicago's 135-year expansion into Hyde Park and beyond (162 points | 45 comments)
13. Legion Health (YC S21) is hiring an AI/ML Engineer ( | hide)
14. NIST selects HQC as fifth algorithm for post-quantum encryption (85 points | 54 comments)
15. Percolation Theory [pdf] (15 points | 4 comments)
16. "It Has Been Determined" That Infected Dairy Herd Serology Can Be Disclosed (3 points | 1 comment)
17. Show HN: Program Explorer, a container playground (30 points | 5 comments)
18. What makes code hard to read: Visual patterns of complexity (2023) (204 points | 195 comments)
19. Espressif's Response to Undocumented Commands in ESP32 Bluetooth by Tarlogic (53 points | 7 comments)
20. America Is Missing The New Labor Economy – Robotics Part 1 (80 points | 85 comments)
21. Show HN: Seven39, a social media app that is only open for 3 hours every evening (638 points | 299 comments)
22. Short Conversations with Poets: Dong Li (29 points | 3 comments)
23. Representing Type Lattices Compactly (66 points | 14 comments)
24. Snapshots of Modern Mathematics from Oberwolfach (9 points | 1 comment)
25. A unified acoustic-to-speech-to-language embedding space (25 points | discuss)
26. Anomalous Ionization in the Central Molecular Zone by Sub-GeV Dark Matter (30 points | 7 comments)
27. AI-Generated Voice Evidence Poses Dangers in Court (81 points | 53 comments)
28. Local Deep Research – ArXiv, wiki and other searches included (125 points | 21 comments)
29. Modern Baby: A pioneering computer from Manchester (42 points | 5 comments)
30. Kissing moons may explain why Earth's moon is so large (90 points | 24 comments)
